testsuite.name: Testcases
testsuite.system-out: TestCase started.... Login Clicking on the login element in the main page Entering the email/Mobile Clicking Continue button TestCase skipped.... Login

TestCase started.... Login Clicking on the login element in the main page Entering the email/Mobile Clicking Continue button entering the password Clicking login button Logged in successfully and Welcome message verified TestCase Passed..... Login

TestCase started.... searchItem Searching Apple iphone by entering text in Search box Clicking on search Icon Clicking on search Item Verifying search item displayed on screen TestCase Passed..... searchItem
TestCase started.... addToCart Clicking on add To cart Button Verifying addToCart button displayed on screen TestCase Passed..... addToCart
TestCase started.... checkOut Verifying checkOut button displayed on screen Clicking on checkOut Button TestCase Passed..... checkOut
TestCase started.... verifyCartProductSameAsSelected Verifying cart item name same as selected TestCase Passed..... verifyCartProductSameAsSelected

TestCase started.... addMultipleItemsSameProduct Apple iphone added to the cart Apple iphone added to the cart again Verifying Apple iphone quantity is greater than 1 TestCase Passed..... addMultipleItemsSameProduct
TestCase started.... editQuantityOfProduct Quantity of Apple iphone changed Verifying Apple iphone quantity is changed to 4 TestCase Passed..... editQuantityOfProduct

TestCase started.... addMultipleItemsDifferentProduct Searching Lenovo 600 Lenovo 600 added to the cart Verifying Apple iphone present in the cart Verifying Lenovo 600 present in the cart TestCase Passed..... addMultipleItemsDifferentProduct

TestCase started.... DeleteMultipleItemsDifferentProduct Clicking on delete button for Lenovo 600 Verifying Lenovo 600 removed from the cart Clicking on delete button for Apple iphone Verifying Apple iPhone 13 removed from cart TestCase Passed..... DeleteMultipleItemsDifferentProduct
TestCase started.... deleteSingleItem Clicking on delete button for Apple iphone Verifying Apple iPhone 13 removed from cart TestCase Passed..... deleteSingleItem
